name: Fusion Heroes (itch)
description:
This project was created for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1. You play as a hero trying to find other heroes to fuse with so you can defeat darkness lurking in the area. It was created in a team of 4:

Bernardo Fernades - Producer

John Heiden - Programmer - https://people.rit.edu/jdh5563/

JPixel - Art - https://www.artstation.com/steve_f

Vinicius Moterani - Music/Sound Design
